name: Of Mice And Cheese
description:
Of Mice and Cheese is a third-person cricket game where you play as a mouse - about -town, Guisseppe. It's after hours at The Cluny and you've got yourself some cheeseballs and a teaspoon - time to play Cricket Pong and try not to get too drunk! 

Each mouse guards a set of shot glasses and they take it in turns to bowl. When bowling, you choose a shot glass to aim for then time the throw with a moving target over a power bar. Similarly, when batting, choose a glass to aim for and hit the sweet spot on a power bar. If cheese lands in your shot glass - drink up! 

Incredibogs!

Kian - Programmer

Emily - 3D Artist

Vic - 3D Artist

Elliot - UI Artist / Designer
